laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Blood tests (including Liver function tests and Lipase)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: WBC increased to 12.2 from an unspecified earlier value, Lipase increased to 6420 from > 4000, Alk Phos increased to 172 from 145, ALT increased to 339 from 244, AST increased to 418 from 316, Tb increased to 2.1 from 1.5.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Ill-defined subtle filling defect within the lower third of the common bile duct, likely sludge, with no stones or strictures. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Sludge extraction was performed.
